column2: "Aber no mu na EWURADZE see me dɛ
column3: sen abopon ebien a ɔtse dɛ kan dze no ma woho
column4: na fow bra me nkyɛn wɔ bepɔw no do

column2: "Na mebɛkyerɛw nsɛm a ɔwɔ nkan no apon a ebobɔɔ no no do no
column4: na fa hyɛ adaka no mu."

column2: "Nna meyɛɛ akeesia duadaka
column3: na meseen abopon ebien a ɔtse dɛ kan dze no
column5: na apon ebien no kitsa me nsamu."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kyerɛɛw apon no do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ kan no nkyerɛwee no tse
column4: mbransɛm du no a ɔnoara fi gya no mu kaa kyerɛɛ hom wɔ bepɔw no do nguabɔ da no: na ɔdze maa me."

column2: "Na medanee fii bepɔw no do sianee
column3: na medze apon no bɛhyɛɛ adaka a meyɛe no mu; na hɔ na ɔwɔ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ me no."

column2: "Na Israelmba tui fii Beerot Bene-jaakan kɔr Mosera: hɔ na Aaron wui
column3: na hɔ na wosiee no; na ne babanyin Eleazar hyɛɛ n’ananmu dzii ɔsɔfo."

column2: "Wofi hɔ tui kɔr Gudgoda; na wofi Gudgoda kɔr Jotbata
"Aber no mu na EWURADZE yii Levi ebusuakuw
column5: na wonhyira wɔ ne dzin mu
column6: a wɔayɛ araa dze ebodu ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na Levi ennya kyɛfa nye egyapadze wɔ no nuanom mu; EWURADZE nye n’egyapadze
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn kaa kyerɛɛ no no."

column2: "Na misiankae wɔ bepɔw no do
column4: adzekyee nye adzesaa adaduanan: na EWURADZE tsiee me aber no mu so; na EWURADZE ammpɛ dɛ ɔsɛɛ wo."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see me dɛ
column4: tu wo kwan kedzi ɔman no enyim; ma wɔnkɔ nkɛfa asaase a mekaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hɔn egyanom dɛ medze mebɛma hɔn no."

column2: "Na afei
column4: ebɛnadze na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn rohwehwɛ wɔ wo hɔ
column5: kyɛn dɛ ibosuro EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn
column8: na edze w’akoma nyinara nye wo kra nyinara asom EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn
column11: nye n’ahyɛdze a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi do wɔ wo yieyɛ ntsi?"

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: ɔsor dzi wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn

column2: "W’egyanom nko na EWURADZE nyaa hɔn ho enyika dɛ ɔbɔdɔ hɔn
column3: na ɔsaan mu yii hɔn asefo a wodzi hɔn ekyir no
column6: dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom ntwitwa hom akoma twatsia na mma wɔnnyɛ asoɔdzen bio."
"Na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn
column6: Otumfo a no ho yɛ hu a ɔnnhwɛ nyimpa enyim

column2: "Odzi egyanka nye okunafo hɔn asɛm
"Dɛm ntsi hom ndɔ ahɔho: osiandɛ ho so hom yɛɛ ahɔho wɔ Egypt asaase do."
"Suro EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn; ɔno na som no; na ɔno na takyer no ho
column3: na ne dzin ho na ka ntam."

column2: "Ɔno nye w’ayɛyi
column3: na ɔno nye wo Nyankopɔn a ɔayɛ ndzɛmba akɛse a ɔyɛ hu a w’enyiwa ehu yi ama wo."

column2: "Nyimpa eduosuon na w’egyanom dze sianee kɔr Egypt; na afei EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ayɛ wo ɔdodow dɛ ɔsor nworaba."
